# Set up 

```{r}
#| label: packages and data
#| message: false

library(tidyverse) # general use package
library(lterdatasampler) # package of data-sets
library(NatParksPalettes) # pakcage for color pallete


data(pie_crab) # crab size dataset
```

# Exploratory data visualization

```{r}
#| label: latitude and size plot
#| message: false

# base layer: gggplot
ggplot(data = pie_crab, # dataset
       aes(x = latitude, # x-axis should be latitude, y-axis is crab size
           y = size,
           color = site)) + 
  # first layer: points to represent individual crabs 
    geom_point() +
    # changing colors ot be different from default
    scale_color_manual( 
      values = natparks.pals("Arches", n = 13, type = "continuous")
    ) + 
      # adding theme 
      theme_minimal()
```
